It's time for the truth.

When I declare "One of you must die!" then I'm going to select one of you as ground zero for my most damaging area attack!

If you trust me, then you're going to want to get outside my target circle as fast as you can!

But if you don't trust me, then maybe you should be inside the circle, because that probably means I'm going to attack everything outside the circle!

I guess you'll just have to learn by trial and error whether or not you can trust me!

Now, hurry! I'm waiting for you...
